thread.title: Love this place!
thread.title_full: Love this place! - Review of Amba Hotel Charing Cross, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: TracyMikeD
title: Love this place!
text:
Yet another fabulous stay at this hotel. Extra special thanks to Cyan for making my husband's birthday extra special. Also thanks to Duane and Laura for sorting out the issues we had with our room. Thanks for making our stay absolutely perfect! We will return. :-)
Room Tip: Use the book your own room facility if it's offered to you. You can use the 360 view. See more room tips
